content.body:
> <@kriskowal:aelf.land> I would like to invite the Signals champion group to join us at a regular meeting of #tc39-tg3-security:matrix.org to talk shop. That meeting is on the TC39 calendar on Wednesdays for Americas and Europe. I’d be obliged to strike up an email thread for scheduling if you can message me email addys.

the TG3 meeting has started:  https://ibm.webex.com/ibm/j.php?MTID=me87a7dba2f405268a892bc69ad1c3cdd
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @kriskowal:aelf.land
I would like to invite the Signals champion group to join us at a regular meeting of #tc39-tg3-security:matrix.org to talk shop. That meeting is on the TC39 calendar on Wednesdays for Americas and Europe. I’d be obliged to strike up an email thread for scheduling if you can message me email addys.
the TG3 meeting has started: https://ibm.webex.com/ibm/j.php?MTID=me87a7dba2f405268a892bc69ad1c3cdd
